column5: Well how else would you wanna spend your anniversary...Hit Port Maitland with plans to try for perch, once there wisely decided to pass and head up river due to the 4-5' rollers and whitecaps. Seasickness was not on the agenda. Trolled the river with a few stops at fav areas...nothing happening til we reached the dam. Silver Bass and Cats were hungry thats for sure. The current was a real match for the Minn Kota and drained the battery in about 1.5 hrs. It was a short day due to the thunderstorm I could see rolling in the background but a good one spent with my better half.
Congrats to you and the missus Joonmoon, looks like a very happy 10th anniversary!
congrats on the anniversary.....looks like your wife caught the bigger fish.
now that's the way to celebrate an anniversary  congrats
She always catches the bigger fish, but thats what keeps her goin. Gotta luv the determination she has, very inspiring for me.
Good going Joon & Goog. You two always manage to catch something, that new boat must be lucky.
so thats how ur marriage lasted....she's a fishing fiend too
Great report and pics joonmoon Happy 10th anniversary to both of you Certainly a moment in time you guys won't forget!!! Great job and thanks for sharing Leechman
